sentence.Network_en: The stench from the sewer is indescribable.

sentence.Network_en: The relief was indescribable. It was freedom after years of slavery. A great weight lifted from me.
sentence.Network_cn: 如释重负的感觉是难以言喻的。这是受多年奴役之后的自由。我卸下了一个重担。

entry.tran: 难以形容的;无法描述的
entry.def: You use indescribable to emphasize that a quality or condition is very intense or extreme, and therefore cannot be properly described.

example.ex: ...her indescribable joy when it was confirmed her son was alive...
example.tran: 儿子活着的消息得到确认后她难以形容的喜悦

example.ex: The stench from the sewer is indescribable.
example.tran: 下水道发出一股说不出的恶臭。

auth_sentence.content: The stories of some of the people he meets are indescribable.
